comment: Arbitrarily assigned internal user ID for the User

description: The full name of the user (last, first)
title: Name

title: Lab Name

title: Lab Head

description: The Harvard ID of the user
title: Harvard ID

title: Harvard ID Initial Expiration Date

description: The phone number for this user

description: The mailing address of the user

description: Screens for which this user is a lead screener

description: The date the user's account was first recorded in Screensaver
